com.buession.redis.client.jedis.operations

类 AbstractHashOperations<C extends JedisRedisClient>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buession.redis.client.operations.AbstractRedisOperations<C>
      • com.buession.redis.client.jedis.operations.AbstractJedisRedisOperations<C>
        • com.buession.redis.client.jedis.operations.AbstractHashOperations<C>
  • 类型参数:
    C - Redis Client JedisRedisClient
    所有已实现的接口:
    JedisRedisOperations, HashOperations, RedisOperations, HashCommands, RedisCommands
    直接已知子类:
    JedisClusterHashOperations, JedisHashOperations, JedisSentinelHashOperations

    public abstract class AbstractHashOperations<C extends JedisRedisClient>
extends AbstractJedisRedisOperations<C>
implements HashOperations
    Jedis 哈希表命令操作抽象类
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.0
    作者:
    Yong.Teng

      • hScan

        public ScanResult<Map<String,String>> hScan(String key,
                                            long cursor)
        从接口复制的说明: HashCommands
        迭代哈希键 key 中的键值对

        详情说明 http://redisdoc.com/hash/hscan.html

        指定者:
        hScan 在接口中 HashCommands
        参数:
        key - Key
        cursor - 游标
        返回:
        返回的每个元素都是一个键值对

      • hScan

        public ScanResult<Map<String,String>> hScan(String key,
                                            long cursor,
                                            String pattern)
        从接口复制的说明: HashCommands
        迭代哈希键 key 中的键值对

        详情说明 http://redisdoc.com/hash/hscan.html

        指定者:
        hScan 在接口中 HashCommands
        参数:
        key - Key
        cursor - 游标
        pattern - glob 风格的模式参数
        返回:
        返回和给定模式相匹配的元素
